content.question: One reason for the central plan of the Dome of the Rock is to

choices.label: segregate figures with sacred or imperial authority from the general population
house large crowds gathered for congregational worship and communal prayer
accommodate the practice of circumambulation around a sacred space within
recall the theme of judgment because of its similarity in design to a law court

content.answer: accommodate the practice of circumambulation around a sacred space within
